name: postman_codegen
description:
Generate a Cortex XSIAM/XSOAR integration from a Postman Collection v2.1.

Creates:
- Integration YAML or package
- Command implementations from Postman requests

Use Cases:
- Convert existing Postman collections to integrations
- Bootstrap integration from API testing
- Rapid prototyping

input_file.description: Path to Postman Collection v2.1 JSON file

package.description: Generate as package format instead of single YML

config_out.description: Generate config JSON for customisation instead of integration
